original_text: On one occasion, while the crowd was pressing in on him to hear the word of God, he was standing by the lake of Gennesaret,
korean_text: 무리가 몰려와서 하나님의 말씀을 들을새 예수는 게네사렛 호숫가에 서서

sentences.original_text: while the crowd was pressing in on him,
to hear the word of God,
he was standing by the lake of Gennesaret,
